Text.Page:
Want to learn how to become a Ebonheart? Earn the coins required from September 24th to September 29th, and exchange them for the Ebonwing Mounts. Learn (and use) all 5, to unlock that title!
Ebonwings posess the hardest of scales, ideally for armorcrafting - though it requires a special breed of Hunter to get even the smallest amount of scales.
